[[inst_hl_sw_upr]]
==== HL.SW.UPR

*Syntax:* hl.sw.upr SrcD, [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw}>], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_sw_upr.svg[HL.SW.UPR encoding,width=800]

*Group:* STA/PRE_INDEX
